item.title: 米莱的全面放松管制计划通过参议院第一道关卡
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统试图放松阿根廷经济管制的主要立法项目在反对党控制的上议院僵持数周之后，距离决定性投票又近了一步。【原文：President Javier Milei’s main legislative attempt to deregulate Argentina’s economy is one step closer to a decisive vote after weeks of stalemate in the opposition-controlled upper chamber.】

item.title: 亚洲新兴市场债券在国债反弹中的涨幅将超过全球同类债券
item.description: 亚洲新兴国家债券将比全球同类债券更受益于国债的反弹，因为该地区的债务与美国同类债券的利差收窄。【原文：Emerging Asia bonds are set to benefit more than their global peers from any rally in Treasuries as the region’s debt enjoys tighter spreads over their US counterparts.】

item.title: 风险情绪抵消中东紧张局势，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 石油在周三回落后持稳，周日欧佩克+供应会议召开前，更广泛的风险厌恶情绪抵消了中东地区加剧的紧张局势。【原文：Oil was steady after retreating on Wednesday, with broader risk-off sentiment offsetting heightened tensions in the Middle East before an OPEC+ supply meeting on Sunday.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好债券暴跌拖累美股戴蒙警告散户交易员不要涉足私人信贷。Meta 删除与秘密影响力活动有关的账户。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Bond swoon drags on US stocks. Dimon warns about retail traders dipping into private credit. Meta removes accounts linked to covert influence campaigns. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国人民币在痛苦中结束五月，美元走弱无济于事
item.description: 对人民币来说，糟糕的四月已经变成了更糟糕的五月，在美元广泛走软的情况下，人民币未能反弹，这是一个警告信号，表明看跌情绪有可能像滚雪球一样越滚越大。【原文：A bad April for the yuan has turned into a worse May, with its failure to rebound amid broad dollar weakness a warning sign that bearish sentiment risks snowballing.】

item.title: 日元交易超过引发疑似干预的水平
item.description: 日元跌穿了促使日本采取最新一轮疑似支撑货币行动的水平，这凸显了干预市场的影响有限。【原文：The yen fell through a level that prompted the latest round of suspected action by Japan to prop up the currency, underscoring the limited impact of intervening in the market.】

item.title: 英国待售住宅创八年新高，但买家仍持谨慎态度
item.description: 5 月份，英国待售房屋创下八年来的新高，这再次表明英国房地产市场正在从去年的低迷中复苏，尽管由于融资成本高昂，潜在买家仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Houses for sale in Britain hit an eight-year high in May in another sign the UK property market is recovering from last year’s slump, even as prospective buyers remained cautious due to high finance costs.】

item.title: 汇丰银行招聘 100 名银行家，大力发展中东财富市场
item.description: 随着越来越多的百万富翁和亿万富翁移居中东，汇丰控股有限公司正向私人银行家们抛出橄榄枝，以拓展业务。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is courting private bankers as it seeks to expand its business of catering to the growing number of millionaires and billionaires moving to the Middle East.】

item.title: 回购令摩根士丹利投资管理公司不再看空中国股市
item.description: 摩根士丹利投资管理公司（Morgan Stanley Investment Management）正在增加对中国股票的投资，因为该公司谨慎乐观地认为，政府推动的股票回购将有助于提振股价。【原文：Morgan Stanley Investment Management is increasing exposure to Chinese stocks on cautious optimism that share buybacks spurred by the government will help boost prices.】

item.title: 部长表示中国将取消对澳大利亚牛肉出口商的禁令
item.description: 澳大利亚农业部长穆雷-瓦特（Murray Watt）表示，澳大利亚五家被禁止向中国出口肉类的主要牛肉生产商将被允许立即恢复贸易，这是中国政府与堪培拉经济关系正常化的最新举措。【原文：Five major Australian beef producers banned from exporting meat to China will be allowed to resume trade immediately, Agriculture Minister Murray Watt said, the latest move by Beijing to normalize economic ties with Canberra.】

item.title: 收益率攀升，亚洲股市跟随美国股市走低：市场综述
item.description: 在美国债券和股票下跌之后，亚洲股市也将下跌，因为国债销售再次疲软，加剧了在美联储不急于降息之际，为美国赤字融资将推高收益率的担忧。【原文：Asian stocks are set to fall after bonds and shares fell in the US, as another weak sale of Treasuries boosted concern that funding the US deficit will drive up yields at a time when the Federal Reserve is in no rush to cut rates.】

item.title: CNBC 称佩尔兹在代理权争夺战失败后出售迪士尼股份
item.description: 据 CNBC 援引知情人士的话报道，激进投资者纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）已经出售了他在华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：Activist investor Nelson Peltz has sold his entire stake in Walt Disney Co., CNBC reported, citing a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 列支敦士登王室支持的 Lightrock 公司进军上市股票市场
item.description: 由列支敦士登王室支持的私募股权公司 Lightrock 正在进军公开交易投资领域，推出了一项新策略，将资金投入全球小型股。【原文：Private equity firm Lightrock, which is backed by Liechtenstein’s royal family, is moving into publicly traded investments with the launch of a new strategy that will put money in global small-cap stocks.】

item.title: 中国因饲料添加剂问题停止美国 JBS 牛肉工厂的发货
item.description: 在向全球最大买家运送的肉类中发现一种有争议的饲料添加剂后，中国已阻止 JBS SA 在美国的一家主要牛肉厂出口牛肉。【原文：China has blocked beef exports from a major JBS SA beef plant in the US after a controversial feed additive was found in meat shipments to the world’s largest buyer.】

item.title: 代理成本飙升，Gildan 计划今年晚些时候首次出售债券
item.description: Gildan Activewear Inc. 的一位发言人告诉彭博新闻社，该公司计划最早在今年下半年出售债券，因为在一场昂贵的代理权争夺战之后，这家 T 恤制造商增加了杠杆。【原文：Gildan Activewear Inc. plans to sell bonds as early as the second half of the year as the T-shirt maker increases leverage after an expensive proxy fight, a spokesperson told Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯将于周日出售价值 100 亿美元的阿美石油公司股票
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯正准备最快于周日正式启动石油巨头沙特阿美公司（Saudi Aramco）股票的二次发行，这次发行可能会筹集超过 100 亿美元的资金。【原文：Saudi Arabia is preparing to formally launch a secondary offering of shares in oil giant Saudi Aramco as soon as Sunday that could raise more than $10 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加息传闻再起 助推 "买高卖长 "期权赌注
item.description: 期权交易商们正大举押注美联储将在更长时间内维持更高利率，因为他们比掉期市场的同行们越来越鹰派。【原文：Options traders are piling into bets that the Federal Reserve will keep rates higher for longer as they grow increasingly more hawkish than their counterparts in the swaps market.】

item.title: 日内交易者押注杠杆 ETF，英伟达看涨交易飙升
item.description: 随着散户交易者对全球 "最重要股票 "的全力追捧，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：The latest Nvidia Corp. frenzy is fueling an unprecedented rally in the booming industry of leveraged-up ETFs as retail traders go all-in on the world’s “most important stock.”】

item.title: 奥兹卡银行突然下跌 17%，房地产压力成为关注焦点
item.description: 在全球疫情爆发后，建造生命科学实验室似乎是一个明智的房地产投资选择：满足医学突破对空间的急剧需求。OZK 银行是在这一行业下了大赌注的银行之一，其中最引人注目的是在圣迭戈的一个庞大的海滨综合体。【原文：It seemed like a smart real estate play in the wake of a global pandemic: build life-science labs to satiate soaring demand for space to develop medical breakthroughs. Bank OZK was among those to bet big on the industry, most notably through a sprawling San Diego waterfront complex.】

item.title: 今年美国交易所最大的 IPO 来自非美国公司
item.description: Waystar Holding Corp. 周二启动的首次公开募股，如果能以最高价募集到 10.4 亿美元，将成为今年美国公司中规模最大的一次。【原文：Waystar Holding Corp.’s initial public offering, launched Tuesday, would be the largest by a US company this year if it prices at the top of its range to raise $1.04 billion.】

item.title: 伊利诺伊州公共债务罚金随着 "不令人兴奋 "的预算案通过而减少
item.description: 伊利诺伊州在市政债券市场上正在缩小与同行的差距，因为投资者预示着预算案的按时通过以及该州财政状况的广泛改善。【原文：Illinois is closing the gap with its peers in the municipal-bond market as investors herald the passing of an on-time budget and a broad improvement in the state’s fiscal standing.】

item.title: 美国清算所 DTCC 称处理问题已解决，行业已实现 T+1 目标
item.description: 尽管隔夜系统出现了一些延误，但金融业在新的一日结算规则实施的第一天就实现了加快处理美国证券交易的关键目标。【原文：The finance industry met a key target to process US securities trades faster on the first day of new one-day settlement rules, although there were some delays to overnight systems.】

item.title: 加纳电力生产商威胁退出债务谈判
item.description: 加纳的私营电力生产商威胁要退出解决 16 亿美元欠款的谈判，这是这个西非国家长期以来债务重组努力中的一个潜在障碍。【原文：Ghana’s private power producers are threatening to walk away from talks to revamp $1.6 billion in arrears, a potential snag in the West African nation’s long-running efforts to restructure its debts.】

item.title: 英国年轻人的住房自有率回升至 2010 年以来最高点
item.description: 一项新的分析显示，尽管房地产价格暴涨，但千禧一代英国人的住房拥有率已反弹至 2010 年以来的最高点。【原文：Homeownership among millennial Britons has bounced back to its highest since 2010 despite the pandemic surge in property prices, according to a new analysis.】

item.title: 巴拉圭最大肉类加工企业债券遭遇会计担忧
item.description: 一位华尔街分析师的报告引发了对巴拉圭最大肉类加工企业财务的质疑，仅用了两个多小时，该企业的美元债券就贬值了三分之一。【原文：It took just over two hours for the dollar bonds of Paraguay’s largest meatpacker to lose a third of their value after a report by a Wall Street analyst raised questions about the company’s finances.】

item.title: 亿万富翁克里廷斯基将以债务和股权方式出资收购英国皇家邮政业主
item.description: 捷克亿万富翁丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）计划以股权和债务两种方式出资收购英国皇家邮政的所有者国际配送服务公司（International Distribution Services Plc）。【原文：Czech billionaire Daniel Kretinsky plans to fund the takeover of International Distribution Services Plc, owner of the Royal Mail, with both equity and debt.】

item.title: 在创下 24 项 S&P 500 指数纪录之后，期权交易员的 "FOMO "情绪已然低落
item.description: 华尔街目前的涨势有一种狂热的特质，让许多人将其与大流行病初期的股票独涨狂热相提并论。所有主要指数都创下或接近历史新高，纳斯达克综合指数中有 57 只股票今年以来的涨幅已超过 150%，而 "流行 "类股票突然间似乎又随意地再次流行起来。【原文：There’s a frenzy-like quality to the rally on Wall Street right now that has many drawing comparisons to the stocks-only-go-up mania of the early days of the pandemic. All major gauges are at or near record highs, fifty-seven stocks in the Nasdaq Composite Index have gained more than 150% already this year, and meme stocks are suddenly, and seemingly randomly, popping once again.】

item.title: 埃克森股东就所有代理提案投票支持董事会
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）的投资者在周三的年度会议上对所有股东提案都投了赞成票，尽管该公司对激进分子的诉讼遭到了强烈反对。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. investors voted in line with board recommendations on all shareholder proposals at its annual meeting Wednesday despite vocal opposition to the company’s lawsuit against activists.】

item.title: WeWork 竞争对手首席执行官出售 8,700 万美元股票偿还银行贷款
item.description: IWG Plc 首席执行官马克-迪克森（Mark Dixon）出售了其持有的全球最大服务式办公室运营商 IWG 10%以上的股份，以偿还一笔个人贷款，从而使该公司股价创下近两年来的最大跌幅。【原文：IWG Plc Chief Executive Officer Mark Dixon sold more than 10% of his stake in the world’s biggest operator of serviced offices to pay off a personal loan, sending the stock to its biggest decline in almost two years.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司贷款人暂停出售公司 5 亿英镑贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，泰晤士水务公司的一家贷款机构已经搁置了出售这家陷入困境的公用事业公司 5 亿英镑贷款的计划。【原文：A lender to Thames Water Ltd has shelved a planned sale of £500 million of the troubled utilities’ loans, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
